name: Toxic Salmon Pool
description:
Toxic Salmon Pool is an endless dodger where you play as a fish inside of an acid pool, trying to avoid the skulls of those who once dared to take on the challenge. Unlock wacky cosmetics, experiment with crazy controls or try to beat your high score!  Q&A:

- Can you play online?

Unfortunately, playing online isn't an option. We feel like the game we've made doesn't require an online mode, though the leader board is online.

- Will there be more updates?

Yes! The game will constantly be updated, whether that's big updates or small updates, there'll always be something added.

- Why do you have to pay?

This game took a lot of time to make and we feel £1 is an appropriate price to pay for our hard time and effort over the long period of months

- Can I play on phone?

We're not too sure right now.  We designed this game to work on PC/Laptop, however you may be able to play on mobile. For now, we recommend not playing on mobile as we've not looked into but we will make it mobile friendly down the line and let you know.

- Where can I contact you if I have any other questions?

chrischapman30198234@gmail.com
